name: Fatality (W.L.O. GAMES)
description:
One of the best in the squadron, Bomb (Experts in disarming explosives in the world), Receives the mission to defuse a high-tech bomb and surgically connected to a person, he will manage to defuse it in time, stay with you the ending that our hero will have .

He believes, according to the discovery, that the bomb has a high lethality capacity, being able to sweep everything within a radius of 5 km from the face of the earth, and being almost close to detonation, it will not be possible to evacuate in time or transport the bomb that is in the center of the city. , it was verified that it had a location which began to accelerate its clock in a possible attempt to move the bomb which, in order to keep the clock passing normally, left it in the center of the city.

Residents are in absolute panic about an event of this magnitude in the center of the city where the party in honor of the mothers of all fathers was taking place, a date very dear to everyone. who is the monster that would do such barbarity.
